title: IMMEDIATE: Update patch-version dependencies
description:
Quick, low-risk dependency updates (patch/minor versions):
- tailwindcss: 4.1.13 → 4.1.18
- framer-motion: 12.23.12 → 12.23.26
- eslint: 9.35.0 → 9.39.2
- lucide-react: 0.544.0 → 0.562.0
- tailwind-merge: 3.3.1 → 3.4.0
- @tailwindcss/typography: 0.5.16 → 0.5.19
- react/react-dom: 19.1.0 → 19.2.3
- @types/react: 19.1.12 → 19.2.7
- @types/react-dom: 19.1.9 → 19.2.3
- eslint-plugin-react-hooks: 6.1.0 → 7.0.1

Action: pnpm update these packages
Risk: Low - all are patch/minor updates
Should complete: This week

title: HIGH: Remove duplicate motion package
description:
Both framer-motion and motion packages installed (v12.23.12)
All code uses framer-motion - motion is unused

Impact: ~100KB bundle bloat
Action: pnpm remove motion

title: MEDIUM-TERM: Setup automated dependency monitoring
description:
Prevent future dependency drift with automated monitoring.

Options:
1. Dependabot (GitHub native)
   - Add .github/dependabot.yml
   - Configure update schedule
   - Set grouping rules

2. Renovate (more configurable)
   - Add renovate.json
   - More granular control
   - Better monorepo support

Recommended: Dependabot for simplicity

Configuration:
- Weekly security updates
- Monthly dependency updates
- Group patch updates together
- Auto-merge patch versions with passing tests

Timeline: Next quarter

title: MEDIUM: Fix non-functional Get In Touch button
description: Location: src/app/about/page.tsx:265-267 Button has no onClick or href - dead click Fix: Convert to mailto link Get In Touch

title: LOW: Dark mode - implement or remove classes
description:
Many dark: classes but no dark mode toggle

Locations:
- CardStack.tsx:41
- ExpandableSummary.tsx:56
- Blog pages

Options:
1. Implement dark mode (next-themes)
2. Remove classes to reduce bundle

title: MEDIUM: Improve newsletter submission UX
description:
Location: src/components/NewsletterSignup.tsx

Issues:
- Opens new tab (breaks SPA)
- Immediate success without confirmation
- Empty catch block
- Redirects users away

Solution: Implement app/api/newsletter/route.ts
- Server-side Mailchimp integration
- Proper error handling
- Keep users on site

title: LOW: Refactor navbar link duplication
description:
Location: src/components/Navbar.tsx:36-47
Repetitive className across 4 links

Extract to constant or map pattern
Improves maintainability, follows DRY principle

title: CRITICAL: Fix missing image assets breaking production
description:
✅ RESOLVED: Missing image assets restored from git history

Restored files from commit cd5f0f5:
- public/Erik_Schneider.png (946x1024, 552KB) - Profile photo
- public/Marcus_Thomas.jpg (1920x1920, 178KB) - Profile photo  
- public/Review-model.png (958x580, 18KB) - Review model diagram

All images now present and ready for use in:
- src/app/about/page.tsx (profiles)
- src/app/page.tsx (diagram)

Resolution: git checkout cd5f0f5 -- public/Erik_Schneider.png public/Marcus_Thomas.jpg public/Review-model.png

title: LOW: Move blog summaries to content.json
description:
Location: src/app/blog/page.tsx:7-11
Hard-coded summaries in component

Move to content/content.json as metadata
Benefits: Centralized content, easier updates

title: SHORT-TERM: Plan Next.js 16 migration strategy
description:
Next.js 15.5.7 → 16.1.1 is a MAJOR version upgrade with breaking changes.

Migration requires:
1. Review Next.js 16 migration guide
2. Identify breaking changes affecting this codebase
3. Test routing and middleware changes
4. Update TypeScript types if needed
5. Test build and deployment pipeline
6. Document migration steps

Breaking changes to review:
- Routing behavior changes
- Middleware updates
- New caching behaviors
- Updated TypeScript support

Estimate: 2-4 hours planning + testing
Timeline: This month

title: MEDIUM: Remove unused CardStack component
description:
src/components/CardStack.tsx never imported/used
67 lines of dead code

Options: Delete, move to library, or integrate
Verification: rg 'CardStack' src/ shows no usage

title: HIGH: Upgrade outdated dependencies
description:
DEPRECATED: Split into more granular issues:
- referee-2cp: Patch version updates (immediate)
- referee-tgz: Next.js 16 migration (short-term)
- referee-6uq: Dependency automation (medium-term)

Closing this combined issue in favor of the specific ones above.
